featureType.name: HEATMAP_sediment_samples
featureType.title: HEATMAP - density of MARS (sediment) samples
featureType.abstract:
This layer represents a density heatmap of sediment samples from the GA MARS (Marine Sediments) Database. Includes spatial replications (repeated timeseries sampling). No weighting has been applied.
This layer represents a heatmap of spatial coverage of seafloor sampling, derived from the GA MARS (Marine Sediments Database) WFS.
The following weightings have been applied to each sample: (1) 2x weighting for sample <3 years old; 1.5x for 3-5 years, 1x for >5 years (2) 2x weighting for samples that have been analysed with public data available (4) deployment points within 5m of eachother have been aggregated and collapsed into a single point (ie no spatial dupliication)
